channel.title: CVE Feed for Amazon Web Services -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Amazon Web Services -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-3101|2024-09-17T02:58:11.277Z -- amazon%20web%20services -- hotdog
item.description: Hotdog, prior to v1.0.1, did not mimic the capabilities or the SELinux label of the target JVM process. This would allow a container to gain full privileges on the host, bypassing restrictions set on the container.
